page.title: 13ROLE OF THE CHURCH IN RHU.
page.content: The Rev.D.Stirling, minister of Rhu and Shandon Parish Church,conducts a service each Sunday morning at 11 o'clock.He feels that it is important to help people to see that the Church is still needed today and that it has to reach out and encourage people to come along and enjoy its fellowship.Rhu Church attempts to do just this with the many organisations it has within _ the Woman's Guild,the Young Women's Group, the Young People' Group for young Church members and those preparing for confirmation,Quest for 12_15 year olds and the various Departments of the Sunday School for children aged 3_11.A creche is also available to allow parents of small children to attend the service.Regular contributions are also made to local charities and Third World countries.
